dict.acceptation: （强烈的）反对，敌对；（政府的）反对党，在野党；对抗，抵抗；相对，对照；

sent.orig: The Government clashed with the Opposition/The Government and the Opposition clashed on the question of unemployment.
sent.trans: 政府与反对党在失业问题上有重大分歧。

sent.orig: When the opposition scores, he looks glum.
sent.trans: 当对手进球的时候，他一脸忧郁。

sent.orig: An opinion that is held in opposition an argument or dispute.
sent.trans: 在争论或辩论中与一种观点针锋相对的观点。

sent.orig: Many in opposition accused the president of misusing public funds. Those are the charges he denies.
sent.trans: 许多反对派的人指责总统滥用公共基金。总统否认这些对他的指控。

sent.orig: Overriding all opposition, he followed a Right-opportunist petty-bourgeois policy.
sent.trans: 他不顾一切反对，执行小资产阶级右倾机会主义政策。
